## Rules

[[grid]]
| [[grid-column | 1 - 4 ]]
| | **Purpose**
|
| [[grid-column | 5 - 13 ]]
| |  The `Layout` is responsible for visually arranging its child components and handling the responsive behaviour (wrapping).
